summary: Conversion for UNPB body of R18Pn 02 - Leere Armor
descriptionHtml:
[font=Verdana][size=6][b][b][center]Leere Armor UNPB[/center]
[/b][/b][/size][/font][i][font=Georgia][size=5][b]Description[/b][/size][/font][/i]
[size=3]This is a conversion for Leere Armor created by NPR or KURESE (not sure which one, since KURESE is the one who upload CBBE and UNP ver). He (Kurese) said: "Please use this MOD freely", so I hope this would help those who are UNPB lover. This conversion is based on UNPB Redux body 2.5.2. Since this is a tough armor, I believe adding TBBP would be unrealistic. So, this mod doesn't include TBBP. But if you want, you can use Body Slide 2 and with right reference, you can add it yourself.[/size]
[size=3]
[/size][font=Georgia][size=5][i][b]Requirements[/b][/i][/size][/font]
[list][*][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37900/?]UNPB Redux[/url] or [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/20227/?]UNPB MTM[/url] or UNPB derivative.[/size][/*]
[/list][size=3]
[/size][font=Georgia][size=5][b][i]Instalation[/i][/b][/size][/font]
[list=1][*][size=3]Download the original UNP version [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/11756/?]here[/url].
[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]Download Install the UNPB conversion via Nexus Mod Manager (NMM)
[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]Overwrite, choose "yes to all" when prompted.
[/size][/*]
[*][size=3]Done[/size][/*]
[/list][size=3]
[/size][font=Georgia][size=5][b][i]Final Words[/i][/b][/size][/font]
[size=3]Please report any clipping issue with screenshots. Please leave a comment and let me know if you have any suggestion or question[/size]
author: Lowe
